comments.content: _Could.. This.. Be.._ 'Helvetica' _/ 'Neue Helvetica'_.? _( Black, Light Extended + Black Extended.? )_
I was thinking... Neue Helvetica 95 Black + Neue 43 Light Extended + Neue 83 Heavy Extended.
